attributes.title: Whatisthiwhapptrasumuch
attributes.review: This app took several hours to download not only that, it also didn’t ended up working. I was gonna support trump, but I guess not anymore, what a shame. Worst app ever.

attributes.title: No 💖🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: This app is super terrible!! Every time I opened it, the annoying orange would appear on my screen, and it would start screaming at me!! Zero out of 10, would not recommend to ANYONE

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: I find this app slow and takes forever to download and how am I supposed to be able to support my President when this app is slow!!🤬😡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I got this app and it glitched my whole phone would not recommend!! Might have to restart my whole phone because of this app! Not happy at all!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: In the past, I’ve had some ups and downs when it comes to apps, but THIS Trump 2020 app is ATROCIOUS!!! It took WEEKS to download and it’s sooooo laggy!! It glitches every two seconds (1.57 to be exact). No one deserves to use this app. It is horrible!!!

attributes.title: How bad this app is WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: It’s horrible it took forever to download it glitches your phone and on top of that they are listening to u and tracking your phone

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I saw this orange on my App Store and I decided that I should download it to stay informed. This app has downloaded putrid, horrific, disturbing pop ups to my phone. When I downloaded it I immediately got viruses on my brand new iPhone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS UNGODLY APP. Jesus would be appalled.

attributes.title: #all countries matter
attributes.review: this app made me phony glitch for over a week! by far the worst app ever made!!!! i am so angry with this i bought my phone just last week and now it’s all glitchy because of this app! THANKS SO MUCH DONALD DUCK 😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Glitchy and unhelpful
attributes.review: I wanted to support my president. However the app is glitchy. All events said trump 2020 but nothing about Michelle Obama. I kept getting removed and it would just freeze up. Worst app ever.

attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: This app is quite terrible!! Took forever to download, and when it finally downloaded the app didn’t even work!!! This is disgusting! No app should be like that!!
